author: rcm
msg: Added methods to ActionAbout interface to allow parameter labels and default values to be set for parametered action methods.
Updated the reflector mechanism to determine what interfaces are used by a naked object.
Modified the isOfType method in NakedObjectSpecificationImpl to check to see if the specified type is one of the interfaces in the declaration.  Prior to this only the classes where being checked.
All vector collection now throw IllegalArgumentException when the contains method is called with null, as it is not object that the collection can ever contain.

author: rcm
msg: Limited the bounds of the overlay views so they can't be dragged out of the frame.
Limited the bounds of the menu so it alway appears with all options completely shown.
Added scroll bars to the error view so all the error text can be viewed.
The spy window can now be closed and reopened from the debug menu.  When closed all call to it are ignored.

author: rcm
msg: Added a series of methods to get the year, month, day, hour and minute from the Date, DateTime and Time objects.

author: rcm
msg: Modified reflector to catch and dispose of action methods that don't use Naked types as their parameters.  This is logged as a warning.
Also, now log action methods that return non Naked types (which have always been disposed of).
